Plot: When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.
Title: Welcome to the Punch
Actors: James McAvoy, Mark Strong, Andrea Riseborough, Johnny Harris
tomatoConsensus: Welcome to the Punch is a little deeper and more thoughtful than most police dramas -- but not quite enough to surmount its thinly written characters and numbing violence.
